LeadCleanInfo.name: LeadCleanInfo
LeadCleanInfo.description: Stores the metadata Data.com Clean uses to determine a lead record’s clean status. Helps you automate the cleaning or related processing of lead records.

Address.description: The compound form of the address. Read-only. See Address Compound Fields for details on compound address fields.

AnnualRevenue.description: Estimated annual revenue of the lead.

City.description: Details for the billing address of the lead.

CleanedByJob.description: Indicates whether the lead record was cleaned by a Data.com Clean job (true) or not (false).

CleanedByUser.description: Indicates whether the lead record was cleaned by a Salesforce user (true) or not (false).

CompanyDunsNumber.description: The Data Universal Numbering System (D-U-N-S) number is a unique, nine-digit number assigned to every business location in the Dun & Bradstreet database that has a unique, separate, and distinct operation. D-U-N-S numbers are used by industries and organizations around the world as a global standard for business identification and tracking.

ContactStatusDataDotCom.description: The status of the contact associated with the lead per Data.com. Values are: Contact is Active per Data.com, Phone is Wrong per Data.com , Email is Wrong per Data.com, Phone and Email are Wrong per Data.com, Contact Not at Company per Data.com, Contact is Inactive per Data.com, Company this contact belongs to is out of business per Data.com, Company this contact belongs to never existed per Data.com or Email address is invalid per Data.com.

Country.description: Details for the billing address of the lead.

DandBCompanyDunsNumber.description: The D-U-N-S Number on the D&B Company record (if any) that is linked to the lead.

DataDotComCompanyId.description: The ID Data.com maintains for the company associated with the lead.

DataDotComId.description: The ID Data.com maintains for the contact associated with the lead.

Industry.description: The industry the lead belongs to.

IsDifferentAnnualRevenue.description: Indicates whether the lead’s AnnualRevenue field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentCity.description: Indicates whether the lead’s City field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentCompanyDunsNumber.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Company D-U-N-S Number field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentCompanyName.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Company Name field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentCountry.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Country field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentCountryCode.description: Indicates whether the account’s Country Code field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentDandBCompanyDunsNumber.description: Indicates whether the lead’s D&B Company D-U-N-S Number field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentEmail.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Email field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentFirstName.description: Indicates whether the lead’s First Name field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentIndustry.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Industry field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentLastName.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Last Name field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentNumberOfEmployees.description: Indicates whether the lead’s No. of Employees field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentPhone.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Phone field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentPostalCode.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Postal Code field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentState.description: Indicates whether the lead’s State field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentStateCode.description: Indicates whether the account’s State Code field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentStreet.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Street field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsDifferentTitle.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Title field value is different from the corresponding value on its matched Data.com record (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongAddress.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Address field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongAnnualRevenue.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Annual Revenue field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongCompanyDunsNumber.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Company D-U-N-S Number field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongCompanyName.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Company Name field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongEmail.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Email field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongIndustry.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Industry field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongName.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Name field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongNumberOfEmployees.description: Indicates whether the lead’s No. of Employees field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongPhone.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Phone field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsFlaggedWrongTitle.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Title field value is flagged as wrong to Data.com (true) or not (false).

IsInactive.description: Indicates whether the lead has been reported to Data.com as Inactive (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedAddress.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Address field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedAnnualRevenue.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Annual Revenue field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedCompanyDunsNumber.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Company D-U-N-S Number field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedCompanyName.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Company Name field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedDandBCompanyDunsNumber.description: Indicates whether the lead’s D&B Company D-U-N-S Number field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedEmail.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Email field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedIndustry.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Industry field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedName.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Name field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedNumberOfEmployees.description: Indicates whether the lead’s No. of Employees field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedPhone.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Phone field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

IsReviewedTitle.description: Indicates whether the lead’s Title field value is in a Reviewed state (true) or not (false).

LastMatchedDate.description: The date the lead record was last matched and linked to a Data.com record.

LastStatusChangedById.description: The ID of who or what last changed the record’s Clean Status field value: a Salesforce user or a Clean job.

LastStatusChangedDate.description: The date on which the record’s Clean Status field value was last changed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of a billing address. Data not currently provided.

LeadId.description: The unique, system-generated ID assigned when the lead record was created.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of a billing address. Data not currently provided.

Name.description: Field label is Lead Clean Info Name. The name of the lead. Maximum size is 255 characters.

NumberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees working at the lead.

Phone.description: The phone number for the lead.

PostalCode.description: Details for the billing address of the lead.

State.description: Details for the billing address of the lead.

Street.description: Details for the billing address of the lead.
